Text: Burn with CDRWIN and then copy to your SD-card in your RNS.
Forgot to mention that it also works with the RNS315.
How burning without an imagefile? Please help
You must burn with program which is included!!

Slovenia Maps not included; can be found here: http://gpsunderground.com/forum/blaupunkt/132-blaupunkt-fx-2010-v2-volkswagen-rns-310-seat-media-system-skoda-amundsen-46.html 

Still seeding with 120/10 mbit line

I do not know how it works for the RNS-315. 
Should I burn these files to CD, using the program cdrwin. And then put them in my nav system in the car or what? You can reply in english german or dutch.

Yes, burn the images with cdrwin (included), then insert the disk in your satnav with SD-card inserted. The satnav will ask if you want to install the data from CD to SD. You can use a CDRW, saving you money if you want to install all the maps.
